export const ItemView = React.memo(
  ({
    invoiceNumber,
    customerName,
    customerPhone,
    trackingId,
    deliveryAddress,
    area,
    shopName,
    salesPointName,
    consignmentSenderName,
    consignmentSenderPhone,
    parcelDeliveryType,
    numberOfParcels,
    hubName,
    cash,
    moduleCode,
    openViewParcelDetailsModal = () => {},
    moveBack = () => {},
    showMoveBack = false,
    showRaiseIssue = false,
    showPrintButton = true,
    showParcelDetailsModalButton = true,
    printParcel = () => {},
    fetchParcels = () => {},
  }) => (
    <ParcelView>
      <LeftSide span={13}>
        <LabeledValue value={trackingId} fontSize={16} onlyShowValue marginBottom="3px" />
        <LabeledValue
          label="C/N Id"
          value={invoiceNumber}
          labelColor="#8E44AD"
          marginBottom="3px"
        />
        <LabeledValue
          label="C/N Parcel Count"
          value={numberOfParcels}
          grey
          marginBottom="3px"
        />
        <LabeledValue value={customerName} onlyShowValue grey marginBottom="3px" />
        <LabeledValue value={deliveryAddress} onlyShowValue grey marginBottom="3px" />
        <LabeledValue value={customerPhone} onlyShowValue grey marginBottom="3px" />
      </LeftSide>
      <RightSide span={10}>
        <div
          style={{
            display: 'flex',
            justifyContent: 'space-between',
            height: '100%',
            flexDirection: 'column',
          }}>
          <Space direction="horizontal">
            {showPrintButton && (
              <Button
                size="small"
                icon={<PrinterOutlined />}
                type="primary"
                ghost
                onClick={printParcel}>
                Print
              </Button>
            )}
            {showParcelDetailsModalButton && (
              <Button
                size="small"
                type="primary"
                ghost
                onClick={() =>
                  openViewParcelDetailsModal({
                    shopName,
                    senderName: consignmentSenderName || '',
                    senderPhone: consignmentSenderPhone || '',
                    deliveryType: normalizeUnderScoreString(parcelDeliveryType || ''),
                    lastMileHubName: hubName || '',
                    cash,
                    trackingId,
                  })
                }>

const FleetConfirmVehicleForm = (props) => {
  const { onFormSubmit, onCancel, fleet, fleetTypeOptions, vehicleTypeOptions } = props;
  const isVehicleDetailsRequired = ['fleet-accepted', 'vehicle-confirmed'].includes(
    fleet.status,
  );
  const { vendorsList } = useSelector((state) => state.lineHaulCost);
  const dispatch = useDispatch();
  const defaultValues = {
    transportTeamMemberName: fleet.transportTeamMemberName,
    vehicleNumber: {
      authority: fleet.vehicleNumber?.authority,
      class: fleet.vehicleNumber?.class,
      first: fleet.vehicleNumber?.first,
      last: fleet.vehicleNumber?.last,
    },
    driverName: fleet.driverName,
    driverPhone: fleet.driverPhone,
    fleetType: fleet.fleetType,
    vehicleType: fleet.vehicleCapacity?.type,
    transportTeamRate: fleet.transportTeamRate,
    fleetAdditionalCosts: fleet.fleetAdditionalCosts,
    demurrageCost: fleet.demurrageCost,
    vendorId: fleet.vendorDetails?.vendorId,
    transportTeamRemarks: fleet.transportTeamRemarks,
  };
  const schema = Yup.object({
    transportTeamMemberName: isVehicleDetailsRequired
      ? Yup.string().required('*Required')
      : Yup.string().nullable(true),
    vehicleNumber: Yup.object({
      authority: isVehicleDetailsRequired
        ? Yup.string().required('*')
        : Yup.string().nullable(true),
      class: isVehicleDetailsRequired
        ? Yup.string().required('*')
        : Yup.string().nullable(true),
      first: isVehicleDetailsRequired
        ? Yup.string()
            .required('*')
            .matches(/^\d\d$/, '*')
        : Yup.string()
            .matches(/^\d\d$/, '*')
            .nullable(true),
      last: isVehicleDetailsRequired
        ? Yup.string()
            .required('*')
            .matches(/^\d\d\d\d$/, '*')
        : Yup.string()
            .matches(/^\d\d\d\d$/, '*')
            .nullable(true),
    }),
    driverName: isVehicleDetailsRequired
      ? Yup.string().required('*Required')
      : Yup.string().nullable(true),
    driverPhone: isVehicleDetailsRequired
      ? Yup.string()
          .test(
            'is-valid',
            'Expected format is: 01XXXXXXXXX',
            (value) => value && value.match(/^(01|8801)\d{9}$/),
          )
          .required('*Required')
      : Yup.string().nullable(true),
    vehicleType: Yup.string().required('*Required'),
    fleetType: Yup.string().required('*Required'),
    transportTeamRate: Yup.number().required('*Required'),
    transportTeamRemarks: Yup.string().required('*Required'),
    vendorId: isVehicleDetailsRequired
      ? Yup.number().required('*Required')
      : Yup.number().nullable(true),
    fleetAdditionalCosts: Yup.object({
      tollCost: Yup.number().nullable(),
      fuelCost: Yup.number().nullable(),
      otherCost: Yup.number().nullable(),
    }),
    demurrageCost: Yup.number().nullable(),
    demurrageCostRemarks: Yup.string().nullable(),
  });
  const [fleetAdditionalCostsVisible, setFleetAdditionalCostsVisible] = useState(false);

export const handleCsvDownload = ({
  parcels = [],
  parcelsTotal,
  collectionsTotal,
  agentMeta = {},
}) => {
  const rows = [
    ['DSR Name', agentMeta?.name || 'N/A'],
    ['DSR Mobile Number', agentMeta?.phone || 'N/A'],
    [''],
    [
      'ID',
      'ORDER ID',
      'STATUS',
      'SALE TYPE',
      'PRODUCT VALUE',
      'INSTANT BAKI',
      'TRADE DISCOUNT',
      'BAKI COLLECTION',
      'TOTAL',
    ],
    ...parcels.map((parcel) => [
      parcel.id,
      parcel.invoiceNumber,
      parcel.status,
      parcel.deliveryType,
      parcel.productValue,
      parcel.instantBakiAmount,
      parcel.tradeDiscountAmount,
      parcel.bakiCollectionAmount,
      parcel.cash + parcel.bakiCollectionAmount,
    ]),
    [''],
    ['Parcels Total', parcelsTotal],
    ['Collections Total', collectionsTotal],
    ['Total', parcelsTotal + collectionsTotal],
  ];

  downloadAsCSV(
    rows,
    `Cash_${agentMeta?.phone || 'N/A'}_${formatDate(new Date(), 'DDMMMyyyy')}`,
  );
};

export const exportPostpaidInvoicesToCSV = (parcels: any) => {
  const csvArray: any[] = [
    [
      'REDX ID',
      'Merchant Invoice ID',
      'Pickup City',
      'Delivery District',
      'Pickup Date',
      'Delivery Date',
      'Verified Weight',
      'Delivery Status',
      'Cash Collected',
      'Delivery Charge',
      'COD Charge',
      'Return Charge',
      'VAT',
      'VAT Amount',
      ...(parcels[0].IS_INVOICE_VAT_INCLUSIVE ? ['Value Without VAT'] : []),
      'Total Delivery Charge',
      'Cash Paid',
    ],
  ];

  let totalOfTotalDeliveryCharge = 0;
  let totalVat = 0;
  let totalValueWithoutVat = 0;
  let totalCashPaid = 0;

  parcels.forEach((parcel: any) => {
    const totalDeliveryCharge =
      parcel.SHOPUP_CHARGE + parcel.SHOPUP_COD_CHARGE + parcel.SHOPUP_RETURN_CHARGE;

    const valueWithoutVat = parcel.IS_INVOICE_VAT_INCLUSIVE
      ? totalDeliveryCharge - (totalDeliveryCharge * 15) / 115
      : totalDeliveryCharge;

    const vatAmount = parcel.IS_INVOICE_VAT_INCLUSIVE
      ? totalDeliveryCharge - valueWithoutVat
      : totalDeliveryCharge * 0.15;

    totalOfTotalDeliveryCharge += totalDeliveryCharge;
    totalVat += vatAmount;
    totalValueWithoutVat += valueWithoutVat;
    totalCashPaid += parcel.AMOUNT;

    csvArray.push([
      parcel.TRACKING_ID,
      JSON.stringify(parcel.INVOICE_NUMBER),
      JSON.stringify(parcel.PICKUP_AREA),
      JSON.stringify(parcel.DELIVERY_AREA),
      parcel.PICKUP_DATE,
      parcel.DELIVERY_DATE || '',
      parcel.PARCEL_WEIGHT,
      parcel.SELLER_STATUS,
      parcel.AMOUNT,
      parcel.SHOPUP_CHARGE,
      parcel.SHOPUP_COD_CHARGE,
      parcel.SHOPUP_RETURN_CHARGE,
      '15%',
      vatAmount.toFixed(2),
      ...(parcel.IS_INVOICE_VAT_INCLUSIVE ? [valueWithoutVat.toFixed(2)] : []),
      ...(parcel.IS_INVOICE_VAT_INCLUSIVE
        ? [totalDeliveryCharge.toFixed(2)]
        : [(totalDeliveryCharge + vatAmount).toFixed(2)]),
      parcel.AMOUNT,
    ]);
  });

  csvArray.push([
    'Total',
    '',
    '',
    '',
    '',
    '',
    '',
    '',
    '',
    '',
    '',
